pdesc: The Quotes App fetches quotes, displays them, allows copying to clipboard, and adding/removing favorites.
A crypto app with navigation, trends, news, and dashboards, offering insights and information for a seamless user experience.

Yumify is a front-end web application built using React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. It features pages for Home, Menu, About Us, and Book a Table functionalities. Users can navigate through these pages seamlessly to explore the restaurant's offerings and reserve a table.

The Dice Game is a luck-based web app created with React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Players select a face of the giant dice, aiming to match it for a win. The game records the number of turns, rewarding higher scores for fewer turns.
